author: Roger Carter
text:
Washington City is in the process of doing some updates to it's land use or general plan.  This is not a complete overhaul, but rather a review of certain land areas and sections of the plan.  I am interested in any cities that have written established procedures for these updates.  In particular; how and when do you involve the public, council and commission involvement, etc.  In short, anyone who has written procedures on this process I would appreciate getting a copy of.
Thanks,
Roger Carter
City Manager 
rcarter@washingtoncity.org
title: General Plan Updates
